name: Splat! (2024)
description:
Character, Story, Lore, the building blocks of every great game...
But that's really hard to make.

SPLAT! Race your way your down a series of increasingly difficult levels avoiding obstacles and trying to reach the end without going Splat!

Gameplay:
You fall through levels avoiding obstacles, and using powerups to try and reach the end. There are no lives but if you don't beat the level before the time runs out you lose. Obstacles may move and trick you so be careful where you aim!

Once the game is complete you can replay all levels and try and beat your best scores!
